title: What file would I have to copy on my USB if I want to transfer LoL in another PC?
body: Installation is taking FOREVER and I just want to play. What file would I have to copy and paste on my USB in order to transfer the game from one PC to another?

replies.body:
If you were to try and move the files over with a USB drive, there's no guarantee that the files would not become corrupted. Your best bet for a stable game would be to wait for that install to finish. If it seems like it's taking too long to install, there might be something slowing down your connection with our servers. 

You could try switching to a hardwired connection while league is downloading, but also take a look over our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if any of those steps help!
